DOC.brief_summary: To study effect of hydroxypropylmethylcellulose 0.3% and sodium hyaluronate 0.18% in the treatment of ocular surface disease in glaucoma patients.
DOC.brief_title: Hydroxypropylmethylcellulose 0.3% and Sodium Hyaluronate 0.18% for Ocular Surface Disease in Glaucoma
DOC.criteria: OSDI > or equal 20 and eye lid inflammation , meibomian gland inflammation,conjunctival injection,follicle at tarsus , positive corneal staining , tear break up time less than 8 seconds , tear volume less than 5.5 mm. Age below 18 yo Active infectious corneal disease Post penetrating keratoplasty or glaucoma drainage device Known allergy to medication Lactation , Pregnant
